00031 #ifndef __ED_SCREEN_TYPES_H__
00032 #define __ED_SCREEN_TYPES_H__
00033 
00034 /* ----------------------------------------------------- */
00035 
00036 /* for animplayer */
00037 typedef struct ScreenAnimData {
00038     ARegion *ar;        /* do not read from this, only for comparing if region exists */
00039     short redraws;
00040     short refresh;
00041     short flag;         /* flags for playback */
00042     int sfra;           /* frame that playback was started from */
00043     int nextfra;        /* next frame to go to (when ANIMPLAY_FLAG_USE_NEXT_FRAME is set) */
00044     double last_duration;   /* used for frame dropping */
00045 } ScreenAnimData;
00046 
00047 /* for animplayer */
00048 enum {
00049         /* user-setting - frame range is played backwards */
00050     ANIMPLAY_FLAG_REVERSE       = (1<<0),
00051         /* temporary - playback just jumped to the start/end */
00052     ANIMPLAY_FLAG_JUMPED        = (1<<1),
00053         /* drop frames as needed to maintain framerate */
00054     ANIMPLAY_FLAG_SYNC          = (1<<2),
00055         /* don't drop frames (and ignore SCE_FRAME_DROP flag) */
00056     ANIMPLAY_FLAG_NO_SYNC       = (1<<3),
00057         /* use nextfra at next timer update */
00058     ANIMPLAY_FLAG_USE_NEXT_FRAME = (1<<4)
00059 };
00060 
00061 /* ----------------------------------------------------- */
00062 
00063 #define REDRAW_FRAME_AVERAGE 8
00064 
00065 /* for playback framerate info 
00066  * stored during runtime as scene->fps_info
00067  */
00068 typedef struct ScreenFrameRateInfo {
00069     double redrawtime;
00070     double lredrawtime;
00071     float redrawtimes_fps[REDRAW_FRAME_AVERAGE];
00072     short redrawtime_index;
00073 } ScreenFrameRateInfo;
00074 
00075 /* ----------------------------------------------------- */
00076 
00077 /* Enum for Action Zone Edges. Which edge of area is action zone. */
00078 typedef enum {
00079     AE_RIGHT_TO_TOPLEFT,    /* Region located on the left, _right_ edge is action zone. Region minimised to the top left */
00080     AE_LEFT_TO_TOPRIGHT,    /* Region located on the right, _left_ edge is action zone. Region minimised to the top right */
00081     AE_TOP_TO_BOTTOMRIGHT,      /* Region located at the bottom, _top_ edge is action zone. Region minimised to the bottom right */
00082     AE_BOTTOM_TO_TOPLEFT    /* Region located at the top, _bottom_edge is action zone. Region minimised to the top left */
00083 } AZEdge;
00084 
00085 /* for editing areas/regions */
00086 typedef struct AZone {
00087     struct AZone *next, *prev;
00088     ARegion *ar;
00089     int type;
00090     /* region-azone, which of the edges */
00091     AZEdge edge;
00092     /* internal */
00093     short do_draw;
00094     /* for draw */
00095     short x1, y1, x2, y2;
00096     /* for clip */
00097     rcti rect;  
00098 } AZone;
00099 
00100 /* actionzone type */
00101 #define AZONE_AREA          1
00102 #define AZONE_REGION        2
00103 
00104 #endif /* __ED_SCREEN_TYPES_H__ */
